name: Ant Killer (Oleg_DJ)
description:
Buy Super Pen 3000: www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ

In this game, you play as an evil boy who wants to kill Lancelot - the hero ant who is looking for the castle where his wife was imprisoned. And a special pen that can write on all surfaces will help him in this.

So, yep. This game was created for Mini Jame Gam #7. Draw lines by clicking your mouse and have fun!
